name: Early Rise Breakfast
ingredients: Other cooked meats of your choice, such as ham, roast beef, etc.

instructions.en: Brown bacon, sausage, onions, and peppers; drain the grease.
instructions.sk: Opečte slaninu, klobásu, cibuľu a papriku; zlejte mastnotu.
instructions.ja: ベーコン、ソーセージ、玉ねぎ、ピーマンを炒めて、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Beat eggs in a large bowl; beat in cream. Add salt and pepper to taste.
instructions.sk: V veľkej miske vyšľahajte vajcia; vmiešajte smotanu. Pridajte soľ a korenie podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: 大きなボウルで卵を溶き、生クリームを加えます。塩コショウで味を調えます。

instructions.en: Arrange meats, onion, green pepper, mushrooms, and cheese in a greased 9x13" baking dish.
instructions.sk: Rozložte mäso, cibuľu, zelenú papriku, huby a syr do vymastenej 23x33 cm zapekacej formy.
instructions.ja: 油を塗った9x13インチの焼き皿に肉類、玉ねぎ、ピーマン、マッシュルーム、チーズを並べます。

instructions.en: Pour egg mixture evenly over everything.
instructions.sk: Nalejte vaječnú zmes rovnomerne na všetko.
instructions.ja: 卵液を全体に均等にかけます。

instructions.en: Bake at 350°F (175°C) for 50-60 minutes, until golden brown and a knife inserted comes out clean.
instructions.sk: Pečte pri teplote 175°C 50-60 minút, kým nezhnedne a nôž vložený do stredu nevyjde čistý.
instructions.ja: 350°F（175°C）のオーブンで50-60分、金色に焼け、中心に刺したナイフがきれいに抜けるまで焼きます。

notes: Makes 8-12 servings. Can be frozen. If not chilled overnight, bake for about 40-45 minutes.
